actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to increase to $3,000 the annual amount individuals are permitted to earn without suffering deductions from the insurance benefits payable to them under such title.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Revises the Social Security Act by increasing to $3,000 the annual amount individuals are permitted to earn without suffering deductions from the insurance benefits payable to them under the Federal Old-Age, Survivors' and Disability Insurance Program.

titles.title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to increase to $3,000 the annual amount individuals are permitted to earn without suffering deductions from the insurance benefits payable to them under such title.
